name: Hippopotamus
movement: walking speed of 40 feet and swimming speed of 20 feet
description: A large beast with robust features, the hippopotamus has a bulky body and a wide mouth filled with sharp teeth.
memorable: Its thunderous bray can incapacitate multiple enemies, changing the dynamics of battle.
goals: To protect its territory and assert dominance in its environment.
relations: Often found in proximity to water bodies, sharing its habitat with various aquatic creatures.
environment: Typically inhabits rivers, lakes, and swamps.
strengths: High strength allows for powerful melee attacks and significant hit points enable it to endure damage.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it less agile and vulnerable to precise attacks.
attacks: Uses a powerful gore attack that deals piercing damage and an area effect thunderous bray.
most_powerful_ability: Thunderous Bray, which can incapacitate multiple enemies in a wide cone.
senses: Its passive perception is average, indicating it does not excel in awareness.
skills: Has a perception score of +0, showing it is not particularly alert.
additional_information: Can hold its breath for up to 10 minutes, allowing underwater engagement.
Rarely engages in territory disputes unless provoked.
Known for its territorial nature and protective behavior towards young.
Its size allows it to dominate encounters but limits its mobility.
Typically rests in water to keep cool and protect its skin.
test_queries: beast that can hold breath for 10 minutes
tank-like creature with significant hit points
clumsy but strong animal in rivers
